title: Boss1000x
author: Boss1000x
content: Hi, Im new here but it got my attentions how much fear i see here.Let me tell you something don't be scared guys.We all are like wall Street and our umbrella are FED they provide funds to markets.I don't live in USA but i can say that i Feed myself from Fed money brrr....i survive of the Fed money i know the financial markets are too big to fall so they always will bail out and keep the sweet funding on.If you hold bigger coin or bigger projects then don't worry.Off course coin can go bust sure but If i have well known project i dont worry about.Also i follow CME GRoUP derivates futures options.I dont worry about dime about FTX i will buy more ftt why ? Becouse the kevin o leary Are in this ftx project so his asking about regulations.Off course this guy will never put his reputation in riskThat's one of things i do i watch BIG GUYS what they do same i try to do.Once sec will regulate then 401k coming in crypto and FTX can be bail out. I want that USA financial instutions money it's so sweet so i follow them i know they will hold all this together.I bought Also Luna i keep buying with dca FTT.Also i did forex deal:war started ukraine russia i bought russian rubles i made a lot money Also i followed to rus vaneck index funds activities.But off course If Asset or coin Has not many well known people in or not very big then Im catious It's all about liquity and flexibility of the liquity..Im real wolf and boss here no fear and nothing and i don't give you advice Do your own reasearch but right now Im buying FTT becouse guy who i follow mr o leary begging for regulations.Regulations means aka bail out.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: One word for all this useless forest of words.Gibberish!

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Why no just go for coins that your mind will be at rest for like bitcoin? There are many altcoins that are shitcoins. You can do whatever you like or whatever you want, you can follow whatever you like or feel like following, but be careful for you not to let altcoins to disappoint you, see altcoins as gambling, use the amount you can afford to lose to invest in altcoins. I understood you about what you mean about FTT and Luna, but they are risky to invest in, but nothing bad to take the risk, but be careful and do it with small amount of money that you are ready to lose like I said before.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: Boss1000x on November 14, 2022, 10:11:13 PMIm real wolf and boss here you are a wolf and a boss with big bullshit. You can tell all you want, but without real evidence, no one will believe your ramblings.you don't have to share your ideas with others, no one will pay you for them. or are you the one who lost most of your money in FTT? and you are now looking for a friend to laugh with when your well is about to dry up?let others make their own decisions about their investments or assets. you don't need to spread such useless information.

comments.author: Boss1000x
comments.body: Quote from: Awaklara on November 15, 2022, 06:48:42 AMQuote from: Boss1000x on November 14, 2022, 10:11:13 PMIm real wolf and boss here you are a wolf and a boss with big bullshit. You can tell all you want, but without real evidence, no one will believe your ramblings.you don't have to share your ideas with others, no one will pay you for them. or are you the one who lost most of your money in FTT? and you are now looking for a friend to laugh with when your well is about to dry up?let others make their own decisions about their investments or assets. you don't need to spread such useless information.I see you not wolf but Im all i know in this financial world if i stay with big well known projects i dont need to worry about i just wait to get regulated then all those 401k funds coming in and i take that sweet money Right now Im waiting for FTT to lower so i can buy more ,anyways 4 th quarter one more crash is coming then at the end of the year 2023.Anyways Market Has rules you need to learn those rules and right now it's full of Fud.Im like Warren Buffett Im greedy now becouse everybody Are in fear once there is regulations then crypto goes to full moon i dont wait that i buy before others Im wolf and i know FED Will Feed me all i have to do is just stay in and wait needless to say but i will buy dca btc Also ...o boy and Solana Looking cheap i'll Grab this one too.Also i buy xrp and when xrp fud started i started to buy instantly If xrp wouldnt succeed then garlinghouse wouldnt never waste his time and eest that nice suit and talking everywhere about xrp Also he got friends in sec it's all connected they Are like me i see that they Are lions wolfes not like the lambs.Im happy that we have fed wall st and financial markets otherwise i Will be doing maybe Street gang banging but now strong person like me don't need to get in trouble the Fed and big financial guys and funds will taking Care of me all i have to do is stay here and invest 10000x coming for me.No fear in me becouse i stay loyal to FED and wall Street real talk homies !

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: You have made so much speech that is not leading to anything but to hype yourself. You are advising people to buy coins and hope you are going to be there to defend all you are saying. There are many shitcoins at there but you are leaving out bitcoin investment , hope you won't come back to cry as you are accumulating.

comments.body: Quote from: palle11 on November 15, 2022, 08:47:18 AMYou have made so much speech that is not leading to anything but to hype yourself. You are advising people to buy coins and hope you are going to be there to defend all you are saying. There are many shitcoins at there but you are leaving out bitcoin investment , hope you won't come back to cry as you are accumulating. I don't hype nothing i just tell you i have no fear i don't have emotions in here.No emotions only cold calculations.Don't follow me this my style just it's not for weak people.I always searching for fud then i invest becouse i know those rich guys would never ever waste their time to get themselfes involved in some scam projects.Will the kevin o leary....would get involved If the ftx was gona be bad project ? Off course not so maybe FTX name or owner will be changed but FTT token stay Same.It's not My problem to think too much all i have to do is just get myself involved in same project as big guys then i wait fud and i wait for Fed LET the Fed sec and all others do their thing and that's it.Right now i hope prices goes lower so i can buy more Even whales Will want coins from me ...lol üòÅ

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: - You have nothing to fear? I hope you don't cry in the end and regret it, this time because it's very difficult to gamble money investing in FTT right now, that's how it happened to luna until it became 0.00028$ each.I don't know if you are just encouraging other members here in the forum to invest in FTT as well as you are brave enough? Maybe then I'll buy it when it becomes 0.0003$ each of those, I can gamble my money for that dude.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: This kind of guys is what Ignore was invented for, I recommend everybody use that instead of wasting time with this kind of mix between gibberish and blatant trolling.I would not be surprised if behind this account is the same person as for Fullbear2222, polo7 and 325btc, which would also mean ban evasion.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Buying FTT and also LUNA, I appreciate your confidence but come to the reality they are broke and it is the end that is why FTX announced they are bankrupted so nothing is going to happen anymore. This is not happening first time and also not going to be the last, every wrong decision will give you a life lesson.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Boss1000x on November 14, 2022, 10:11:13 PM...I bought Also Luna i keep buying with dca FTT.OP chose a very bad strategy for himself, buying coins with a dubious reputation, while there are a lot of coins around, the price of which is now at minimum values. There is a very high risk that FTT and Luna will never recover to their previous values again.

comments.author: ShowOff
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on December 01, 2022, 05:46:18 PMOP chose a very bad strategy for himself, buying coins with a dubious reputation, while there are a lot of coins around, the price of which is now at minimum values. There is a very high risk that FTT and Luna will never recover to their previous values again.Of course, FTT and Luna should be ignored and I would never gamble with either altcoin. Anyone who is aware of the risks probably wouldn't invest in either altcoin, but we wouldn't discourage people from gambling with both as long as they can afford to lose money.So let them be with themselves and their own choices even though we have suggested the best for them. Life would be calmer if the investment we currently have is bitcoin, besides that we see too much risk in the long term.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on November 15, 2022, 03:34:04 AMWhy no just go for coins that your mind will be at rest for like bitcoin? Many altcoins are shitcoins. You can do whatever you like or whatever you want, you can follow whatever you like or feel like following, but be careful for you not to let altcoins to disappoint you, see altcoins as gambling, use the amount you can afford to lose to invest in altcoins. I understood you about what you mean about FTT and Luna, but they are risky to invest in, but is nothing bad to take the risk, but be careful and do it with small amount of money that you are ready to lose like I said before.The question is, if it crashed once what make you think it won't crash again, I can never trust altcoin most especially coins like Luna who we know the bad story surrounding it and the CEO.risk on altcoins or exchange, is too big a risk I can take I will rather hold my Bitcoin in my cold wallet and go to sleep for 10 years without worries, but which altcoin can survive that period of time? Those who bought bitcoin 10 years ago are already billionaires and millionaires today.But what can we say about those who bought Luna just 1 year ago or few months back, your answer will be the same as mine.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on November 14, 2022, 11:47:51 PMOne word for all this useless forest of words.Gibberish!I read it once, I read it twice and honestly it‚Äôs hard to tell if he is trying to be funny, it‚Äôs a big joke or the combination of very bad English.Either way. This was written a few weeks back, when it looked like ‚Äúmaybe FTX could be saved‚Äù however now the Line is in the sand and they are definitely gone for good.

comments.author: doomloop
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on December 01, 2022, 11:58:57 PMThe question is, if it crashed once what make you think it won't crash again, I can never trust altcoin most especially coins like Luna who we know the bad story surrounding it and the CEO.risk on altcoins or exchange, is too big a risk I can take I will rather hold my Bitcoin in my cold wallet and go to sleep for 10 years without worries, but which altcoin can survive that period of time? Those who bought bitcoin 10 years ago are already billionaires and millionaires today.But what can we say about those who bought Luna just 1 year ago or few months back, your answer will be the same as mine. Btc and the top cryptos can crash and recover. They will work like this forever but for those who are shitcoins, they can crash and won't recover again. Not all altcoins are junk. As long as you know how to do a research then you can always find a good one but you should observe them because who knows?Maybe the devs of those coins became greedy or they can lose interest on their project which can result for the collapse of the coin but this can't possibly happen with btc and we don't even know if its founder is still alive or not so there is no need to worry about it. Overall, investing won't only depend on the asset but will also depend on the person that invests on it. Not all those who bought btc are in profit and not all those who bought luna are losers.

comments.author: South Park
comments.body: Quote from: Boss1000x on November 14, 2022, 10:11:13 PMOnce sec will regulate then 401k coming in crypto and FTX can be bail out. I want that USA financial instutions money it's so sweet so i follow them i know they will hold all this together.I bought Also Luna i keep buying with dca FTT.For what I can understand it seems you believe FTX is going to be bailed out in a way similar to what we saw during the real estate crisis in the US, but why is that the case? FTX is not a bank and it is not like governments want to help this market to grow, so it is in their best interests to let it crash so fear takes over the market, however at the end you are free to do whatever you want, it is your money and if you believe you are right then you can follow this strategy, however I doubt you will find many members on this forum which will support your views.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on December 01, 2022, 11:58:57 PM...Those who bought bitcoin 10 years ago are already billionaires and millionaires today...It is difficult to make predictions about the price of bitcoin, which will be in 10 years. But there are also those who bought BTC 5 years ago and now have a loss, despite the fact that during this time bitcoin has established ATH. Maybe it's still better to partially fix the profit?
